data.message: Hi, I have reported a picture of 3 girls in their bras on facebook and they are underage and I dont think it should be on facebook even if they are proving a point and I was told it wasnt against FBs standards Thanks.

replies.message: Hey Cierra. To report photos that you think may go against our Community Standards, follow these steps: http://bit.ly/2bvlH5O. Keep in mind no one will know if you reported a photo. For more information about our Community Standards, see: http://bit.ly/2bvnCqE. -Kevin
Yes I have reported and the photo is still up and facebook team said that it wasnt against the Standards
